alert.note: Alert for Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 06 at 1:55PM MDT until April 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow will continue through this evening, with additional accumulations generally less than an inch. The combination of snowfall and areas of blowing snow may lead to significantly reduced visibility at times.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
